text:
Gérard Philippe René André Larcher (born 14 September 1949) is a French politician. He has been the President of the Senate since 2014. He was also the Senate President from 2008 to 2011. He is a member of The Republicans. He has been a Senator for the Yvelines department since 1986.
He also was Mayor of Rambouillet from 1983 to 2004 and again from 2007 until 2014.
